mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, WRITER, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FILES WHERE BOARD.BNO = FILES.BNO ) FILESCOUNT, TO_CHAR( REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) REGDATE, HIT FROM BOARD WHERE MENU_ID = #{ menu_id } ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT BNO, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, TO_CHAR( REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) REGDATE FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{ bno }
SELECT FILE_NUM, BNO, FILENAME, FILEEXT, SFILENAME FROM FILES WHERE BNO = #{ bno }

SELECT BNO, TITLE, WRITER, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FILES WHERE BOARD.BNO = FILES.BNO ) FILESCOUNT, TO_CHAR( REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) REGDATE, HIT FROM BOARD WHERE MENU_ID = #{ arg0 } ORDER BY BNO DESC OFFSET #{ arg3 } ROWS FETCH NEXT #{ arg4 } ROWS ONLY
